review: Bought 3 of these for my home. Many great features and performance is generally excellent. However, even when connected by Ethernet, Plex streaming performance is poor with a lot of buffering. This is despite having a high end server that never exceeds 50% CPU. Using a Roku 3 it works as desired, so the problem is either with the Plex Fire TV app or the device itself. Disappointing.
